snippet: Fourth-quarter earnings declined to $22.8 million, compared with $66.2 million a year ago.
abstract: AOL reports fourth-quarter profit that beats Wall Street expectations after an increase in display advertising revenue overshadowed a decline at its Internet dial-up business; profit was $22.8 million, or 23 cents a share, down from $66.2 million, or 60 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Fourth-quarter earnings declined to $22.8 million, compared with $66.2 million a year ago.

headline.seo: AOL Profit Declines but Beats Expectations
headline.main: Despite Slide in Profit, AOL Exceeds Expectations
headline.print_headline: Despite Slide In Profit, AOL Exceeds Expectations
